syllabus:
**Course Description**

This course aims to give students more advanced ideas of semantics. Studies in areas such as negative polarity items, aspect, modalities, resultative, and scalarity will be covered in this semester.

**tentative schedule:**

**week 1** introduction

**week 2**  negative polarity items 

**week 3**  negative polarity items

**week 4**  aspect & resultatives

**week 5**  aspect & resultatives

**week 6**  aspect & resultatives

**week 7**  modality

**week 8**  modality

**week 9** modality

**week 10** individual conference and  term paper outline discussion

**week 11**   Scalarity

**week 12** Scalarity

**week 13**  Scalarity

**week 14**  prototype and grammaticalization

**week 15**  prototype and grammaticalization

**week 16**  term paper presentation

**week 17**  term paper writing

**week 18**  term paper due
